name: Hydro Cool Firming Eye Gels
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:.What it is formulated to do:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: -Acetyl Hexapeptide-8: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by relaxing facial muscle contractions..-Gingko Biloba Extract: Supports natural blood flow to brighten the under-eye area and help reduce puffiness..-Hydrolyzed Elastin: Helps restore tone and firmness to under-eye area..-Coenzyme Q10: A powerful antioxidant, fights free radicals which lead to premature aging...Water *, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Agar, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Angelica Archangelica Root Water*, Hydrolyzed Extensin, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Copper Tripeptide-1, Panax Ginseng Callus Culture Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Perfluorodecalin, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Peg-75 Shea Butter Glycerides, Glycosphingolipids, Xanthan Gum, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Flower/leaf Extract, Buddleja Davidii Extract, Rubus Chamaemorus (Arctic Cloudberry) Seed Oil, Oxycoccus Palustris (Arctic Cranberry) Seed Oil, Aluminum Glycinate, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Phenoxyethanol, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol. .*Component of Icelandic Glacial Water.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use once a week or whenever you need a quick fix..-Remove backing and apply gel side to undereye area for 10 minutes. .-After treatment, gently peel away patch and dispose of. ..Precautions:.-Do not ingest..-If product comes in contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

shades.shade_name: 4 x 0.11 oz/ 3.2 g pairs of eye gels
4 x 0.11 oz/ 3.2 g pairs of eye gels

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these under eye patches. They really help with puffiness and appear to brighten the dark circles I have. I will pop them on for 10 minutes after washing my face and before applying any other skincare. Obviously they aren't a permanent fix, more of a pick-me-up when your face needs it. They are great cost wise too compared to similar products. I buy the value pack of 16 sets and when I get the 20% savings code, they end up being less than $4 for each set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great eye mask that I keep coming back to (and I have very sensitive/reactive skin). I keep them in the fridge for better cooling + de-puffing! Love these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used these in the past and they worked great. I donu2019t know if I received some old batch, but my eyepatchu2019s are completely dry, and they are not doing anything. There is literally no effect happening, and I have use these before for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Will buy again! So good and a good price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought these in 2020 and loved themu2026 I feel like something has changed because now anytime I use them I end up with what looks like burn marks where the patches were!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It cooled my skin and de-puffed but it burnt my skin and made it red. Dont use this for the first time if you are going to an event. I made that mistake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a few weeks but I really didnu2019t see any difference in my eyes. And I didnu2019t feel any coolness while using it.

reviews.review_title: If you know you know. This product is chefs kiss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these. I keep them in the fridge and use them when Iu2019m really trying to look my best for a date night or event. When used with my skincare routine and then applying make up afterwards, there is a noticeable brightness under my eyes. These are a must have for me in my kit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely helps reduce puffy eyes, feels cool to the skin. After apply it, my eyes feel smooth. Always carry one pack in my travel bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These did nothing for me and I saw zero difference for dark circles or puffiness. Iu2019ve used the entire box and will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like pairing it with their micro needle eye patches. These ones are very soothing when you get serious puffy eyes (recommend it if you cry a lot). Super nice when theyu2019re put in the fridge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eye mask! Always use it for my makeup clients while doing their makeup. Super cooling and hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a high hopes in these eye gels but there is nothing gel about them and have experienced no results.

reviews.review_title: Had to put my OWN eye gel product underneath pads
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There's definitely a slight cooling effect when on, but they are completely dry, and seems like there's zero product actually in them. I put them on and they stick well, because it seems like the only thing they are is basically a sticker.  After 10 mins I ended up slightly pulling it off halfway, then I put my OWN Dior cooling eye gel onto my under eyes, then placed back their eye pads over my product.  Left that on for some time to perhaps help my own eye treatment penetrate... you SHOULDN'T have to do that! So if you're not satisfied like me, try that out with them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have continued to repurchase these eye gel masks! Keep in mind that they are more designed for cooling + depuffing. I use them in the morning after my moisturizer and it just calms my skin and depuffs significantly. I don't think they are designed for a long-term skin fix. I consider these eye mask versions of a cold spoon in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved them but I think there is something better on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Regret this purchase since these dry patches did nothing. So disappointed in this product. Duh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Canu2019t say whether this product is good or not because once I opened the sealed package, all pads were bone dry! I have to return this product without having the opportunity to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE these eye masks! They donu2019t slip and slide around like most, feel so cooling and refreshing, and I definitely notice a difference after taking them off. I thought they were pricey at first but will def continuare to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like these eye masks and the difference is noticeable immediately but wears off. As long as you are aware of this, then you know what to expect from them.
Unimpressed - over half of them were bone dry. Would not recommend at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my go to products. Been purchasing for years

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best eye patches I have ever used. Got these as a sample. The instructions indicate 10 minutes, I used them for 20. The texture beneath my eyes has never been this soft and hydrated. An amazing experience. Will buy in the future .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite eye patches. Instantly cooling and great before makeup application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these because of a dermatologist's recommendation and I have to say, as someone who often ugly cries herself to sleep at night, these are amazing!!! They really de-puff and minimize fine lines. My under-eye makeup went on really well after using them. They are very effective in my opinion and worth your money!

reviews.review_title: it works, but nothing to run to the selves for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this up when it was recommended to me in store. I donu2019t notice a drastic difference after use. It definitely had a cooling effect though, and stays in place and does not slide around. I got it for dark circles and notice a difference after use but not one that lasts. Iu2019m 5 months postpartum though so I probably need a holy grail to help these bags lol. Theyu2019re nice, but I wonu2019t purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried all different under eye patches from the Shiseido ones that are $$$ to the cheapie gold ones from Amazon. These are the first ones Iu2019ve tried that actually work.  Im 43 and have under eye wrinkles that are much worse when Iu2019m tired. 30 minutes with these and the wrinkles are gone! Itu2019s only temporary but it allows me to actually leave the house without sunglasses on!  Highly recommend for those days when you need something to make you feel normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not firm or cool.  There is no product on the masks so Iu2019m not sure how itu2019s supposed to work.  Big waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed these and used all of them. I put them on when I woke up feeling particularly gross and tired, and took them off before my first video meeting of the day. I saw a noticeable difference. They do feel very cooling.   Cons, they are very overpriced, and there is a ton of packaging to feel guilty about.   I'm planning on trying something reusable that you keep in the fridge, to see whether my results were from the formula itself or just from coolness under the eyes. Suggestions I've read include using cold spoons, or keeping your jade roller in the fridge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this for the first time based on reviews. Definitely noticed a bug reduction in puffiness and lines around my eyes after one use. Will be using this again and adding to my routine!

reviews.review_title: DO NOT WALK, RUN FOR THIS PRODUCT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it's excellent, I know people often are skeptical when it comes to trustworthy products from any store. Although, this is a great product as it is great to put on after a long hard working day. I normally use these once a week and they last a long time. i always look refreshed days after wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most patches came yellow and smell stale. They left marks on my skin for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels good on eyes, cooling and very luxurious. However nothing to do with firming

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Slept with these on and they moved during the night and I woke up with a dark bruise on the side of my eye that lasted a few weeks :(. also saw no difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As you can see from the pictures, it rotten and smelly. I bought this product before, so I know how it smells and looks like, this pack is definitely expired. Never purchase it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best after a long summer's day. Cool my warm puffy eyes. I have allergies and had no reactions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to use three of the eight packs and loved the experience. I wanted to treat myself to a cozy night in with a movie and eye mask but when I went to use the patches, they were all various shades of yellow. So disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a patches lover, but It is the first time when I have bought Skyn Iceland patches and I like the product: it is easy to use, has good moisture, and has a positive result. You won't have a problem periodically relocate patches: they stay in one place and the result is good. I use a few time a week, and it works. Also, for me important ingredients, and it is different compared to others companies. Definitely will keep it on my table.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never had any problems whatsoever. These eye patches are amazing in my own opinion. I use them once or twice a week especially when I wake up and have puffy eyes. I put them on when I wake and leave them on 10-15 mins before doing my beauty routine and i look so much more refreshed after. Also love the cooling effect in the morning! A must-have for me!

reviews.review_title: Not sure what these dry pads are trying to accompl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These pads are dry when opened, when applied, and when peeled off. So was the skin under my eyes once u201ctreatmentu201d was complete. I am not sure how any active ingredients get into your skin via this dry product and TBH, Iu2019m not sure there are any ingredients in these pads. These are so bizarre, I think the company must have developed these as a joke to see if anyone would be dumb enough to buy them. These make no sense whatsoever. You would be better off placing banana or apple peels under your eyes to achieve an effect. Donu2019t waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the de-puffing effect, but they are not great for sensitive skin. I got patch-shaped redness under my eyes after using them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are the best eye masks!! I really struggle with dark under eyes and can never seem to get rid of them (genetics). However these masks REALLY do the trick and completely wake up my under eyes. The trick is i keep them in my fridge so that they're cold and then i leave them on for 10 minutes. These are amazing and Kourtney Kardashian recommended them to me. She uses them before glam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While the effects were not dramatic, I genuinely saw a difference in the morning that lasted over as few days.   I am going to purchase more and see what happens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beware of defective product... opened two packs and they were both like this. Did not bother checking the rest... returned. Itu2019s not suppose to be yellow. Iu2019ve tried this product before and I liked it but this is just scary!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an eye mask to put on when i need to relax and this was GREAT. Al though it doesnt have permanent results, it gives great results for a few hours. So i use it while i apply my eyeshadow and do my brows and then i take them off. I RECOMMEND IT 100% but just remember the results are only for a few hours. So use it on special occasions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I kept these in the fridge and they felt incredible. I love that they stick on and won't move, especially if you're doing a bunch of things while they on. My under-eye does look a bit more plumped and firm after using these.  They are a bit pricey and I find I am able to use other similar products from other brands at a better price point.

reviews.review_title: Usually amazing, but foul so far this year :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve bought this product for the last few years and have loved it and recommended it to so many. But I bought this product back in January and one of the patches was discoloured and smelled like spoiled oil. Sephora swapped it out for me, but the new package was just the same. Iu2019m desperately hoping that itu2019s a faulty product run and I can swap them out for a proper package soon. Such a shame as the product is typically a go-to for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mine were dried out and did not stick on / have any effect.

reviews.review_title: I am a slave for these patches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: All Iu2019m saying is put them in the fridge for 10 minutes before you put them on...life changing. I look like Iu2019ve been reborn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these. They cool your under eyes which fees amazing. And they leave a notice me difference for reducing puffiness. Thy are a staple for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Rancid!!!! I purchased these in January and just opened them now (beginning of March). They are all discoloured and smell so rotten my entire bathroom stinks. All 8 patches had to go in the trash. Total waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this as I really enjoy the cooling lotion, but the shelf life on these is incredibly short. I ordered these back on Labour Day weekend and they were rancid. Sephora replaced them, but here I am 5 months later and the gels I had left have gone rancid as well. Not only is the smell very offputting (rancid oil -- its likely the olive oil ingredient) but they discolour from pure white to a darker offwhite. In some of the packets only one of the gels in the pair had gone off. These only need to be used every couple of weeks, so that as really disappointing. Will not be buying these again and can't recommend them. I'll stick to my eye creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was searching for a cooling + firming eye mask that would help with overall 'mom fatigue' and tried a few brands but this has been my favorite by far! It has a subtle cooling effect, and I felt it helped firm up the skin. These are a generous width and covered the area at the inner crease of my eyes and nearly up to the ends of my eyebrowsu2014great coverage. Only 4/5 stars as I wish they felt more hydrating as well; but this is pretty standard for the cooling gel masks I've tried. I could see results immediately after use and left on about 15-20 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a great investment! I donu2019t see a huge long term change in my under eyes but it helps tackle short term puffiness and fatigue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product on a few models for a photo shoot and 4/5 of them showed signs of red, uncomfortable and sensitive under eyes but only left them in for the recommended 10 mins. Cooling sensation was there but no benefits showed. Wouldnu2019t not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. It has a great cooling effect but doesnt moisturize at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These do work! Broke up with my bf and had really puffy and red eyes with huge dark circles from crying. It helped a lot with the puffiness and redness. Just wished the cooling sensation lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought these for my bro and he said 5 STARS! These don't suck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite eye mask. They feel good and cooling, don't leave an excess of product on your skin. They stick, so you can go about your morning/evening without them sliding down your face! My eyes look fresh and awake after using them. I always buy the 8 pack around xmas as they're great stocking stuffers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used another product that dried out under my eyes. They were dry and flaky and I had dark circles. I put these on for about 8 minutes and the change was incredible! It must work differently on different people, but it definitely gave me an instant boost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Barely any product when applying. Left eye mask on from 15-20 mins max, and once removed there was a red mark left, with a noticeable outline of the eye mask. Unsure as to why this happened, used other products in their line with no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and cooling. These are my favourite eye gels by far. Great little pick me up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love them! Iu2019m not sure they help with the look of dark circles . But theyu2019re cool feel really wakes you up and helps de puff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended from a Sephora staff to help with under eye circles and help me look more rested and I honestly didnu2019t this they did anything The good things are they stayed on well and didnu2019t slide at all Will not buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wish I did a before & after ! I suffer from insomnia and hadnu2019t slept in 3 days and my eyes were noticeably puffy both under & the eyelids. Iu2019ve been using these here & there and get good results but this time I put the gels on both under and over which Iu2019m not sure is u201crightu201d but I was desperate. And I was stunned to see the puffiness was actually gone !! And this morning I am still able to see the results from when I did the patches last night. I think these are worth a try even if you just buy the 4-pack itu2019s $20 CAD. I just bought my first 8-pack. Donu2019t snooze on these. I am excited to try their facelift in a bag now !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand the hype. They are NOT hydrating at all. Cooling, at best. I left them for 30 minutes and they were GLUED to my undereye, pulling my skin and leaving a red hue. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These feel really nice and cooling. They seem to have an immediate effect but it doesnu2019t last long. Nice treat after a long week, but I bought them on sale and wouldnt pay full price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after the first use, both my mother and I saw that the under eye area is more firm and less dark!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used 4 so far and I see no difference. They feel cooling while on but the skin under my eyes looks no different when I remove them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this during the quarantine. I was staying up really late and waking up early and I would get these really dark circles under my eyes. I used this in the morning and I like that there's a cooling effect. After removing the patch, the darkness under my eyes disappear. My eyes appear brighter and lighter, like I had a full 8 hour sleep. Now that I'm working from home and I have a more normal sleeping schedule, I would use this once a week, at the beginning of the week, to help me look alive for video call meetings. Great product, I recommend!

reviews.review_title: Way too much packaging, mediocre product
reviews.review_text: The amount of packaging that goes into this product is insane (IMO irresponsible) there is the bag shown here, individually wrapped sets of 2 gels that sit on a plastic holder with adhesives to remove. That alone is enough to ensure I don't buy this product again. Additionally, the product itself isn't great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It hydrates my eyes but that's it. Definitely not worth it for the price. You can get cheaper and more effective ones in any kbeauty brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked these. Immediately after using these I felt that my under eyes looked fresh / less dark than normal and made me look more awake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Un must pour les yeux! Dites adieu aux cernes noires et aux poches!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. One of the best eye masks Iu2019ve used. I travel a lot and these are a must have for reducing puffiness. A staple that I buy over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different kinds of eye gels, and none of them compare to these! One of the best things is that they only need to be left on for 10 minutes to work, while most of the other ones I've tried say anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour. They don't completely cure the dark circles I've inherited, but they make a noticeable difference and get rid of puffiness too. Instead of constantly looking like I have been awake for days at a time (even after getting 7-8 hours of sleep every night and using eye cream religiously), these make me look like I am alive and ready to take on the day. Since they're on the more expensive side, I only use them once every few weeks, or before important events, but if I could afford to, I would use them more regularly, because they work miracles for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t find that they did anything for me. Not worth what youu2019re paying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These eye gels replenish your soul. Iu2019ve been drunk, hungover, on two hours of sleep, and my eyes so puffy I can barely see, and these eye gels made me come out looking like a 16 year old in the summer dewy as f@&). Donu2019t sleep on these and most importantly donu2019t take them off until after you finish putting on your eyeshadow. Pro tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a UNI student. I barely sleep. My eyes have permanent bags under them.  These patches are soooo nice! They have a lovely cooling effect that makes me feel more awake once I put them on. If you want, you could put them in the fridge for a super cooling experience. I'm on my third package of these; I highly recommend. Also just nice for a spa night :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved these. I had a trial pair and they feel so good. They are cooling, comfortable, and make my skin feel great underneath. Would def buy more to see if there is noticeable improvement of puffiness over time, as a one time trial is not enough to base my entire opinion on them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite eye patches ever !!!! They really do have a cooling effect AND I LOVE THAT THEY ARE NOT DRIPPING IN SERUM, they feel almost dry but theyu2019re not!! Left my dark circle area feeling and looking super duper soft and hydrating! I bought the four pack first and now I got the 8 pack because Iu2019m gonna be using them a lot!!! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, amazing! Even as a regular user of retinol one the eye area, I still benefitted from using these. Visible results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these work so well! the results are very visible immediately after taking the mask off, so I use them the morning of a big day, or right before getting ready for an event. if you put them on the night before I find the difference isn't as significant. I enjoy all the products in this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these eye gels! I like how they stick onto your under eyes and do not slip. They feel cool and hydrating under my eyes. Right away after using 1 pair my eyes are less puffy and my dark circles lightened. I like to store these in the fridge for them to be extra cool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan. Got a sample with my points and really helped my puffy and dark eyes. Will definitely purchase more.

reviews.review_title: Did nothing for my eye areas

Whatu2019s wrong with it? It sticks on my fingers I am glad I didnu2019t use it all my eyes directly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Put these in the fridge before you use them for a more refreshing feel! I love these eye masks. Very hydrating, and takes away any puffiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on the fence for this one. I obtained a sample through my points and was really excited to try this product out. They were really easy to apply to the under eyes and I didn't mind the smell. But unfortunately I didn't find that it did anything. Mind you I only had one sample so I didn't expect to. I would be interested in trying / purchasing this product in the future to get a good feel if this product will actually do anything for me or not. I did find this relaxing though when I paired it with a face mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best eyes patch ever ! Leave the under of my eyes perfect before a make up or a mask!!! Really easy to apply!  Already purchased again !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love them! If let on too long they make your under eyes a little tight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: cool calm and collected!!! a great deal for 8 sets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 100% helps with puffiness and tired eyes. I suffer with dark circles and puffiness and this def helps on those bad days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Useless product. It claims to  Firm De-puff Reduce wrinkles Tone Reduce dark red circles  I found it made absolutely no difference whatsoever. I kept them in the fridge too. When applying, it felt very soothing which I liked. But there was absolutely no visual benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am kinda of upset I thought these would be cool to try... there is no actual product that absorbs into your skin it is just supposed to cool them and I found that they did not even do that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t see any after effect or result. Will not buy again. Will look for something different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No difference, didnt do anything to my puffy eyes and dark circles. I wont buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These feel soo refreshing. I have an issue with iron deficiency on occasion so I get major dark puffy circles under my eyes. These did make a fairly noticable difference for me. definitely considered again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. I thought that I would try this product based on the reviews. This product was a waste of money. These eye masks are dry and did absolutely nothing. I let my friend try it and she also saw no difference. I just ordered the Lise Watier eye masks and hopefully they will be better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These feel so cooling and relaxing on the skin, the experience is absolutely fantastic. I havenu2019t seen any results with brightening my dark circles or reducing fine lines, but I would recommend these if youu2019re looking to treat your self, or if you have puffy eyes, these could be a good prep before an event or special occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the BEST eye gels I have ever used. Instant results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These eye gels felt nice at first, but once I took them off my skin felt very irritated and I was blotchy and red. I am not sure why because none of the ingredients seemed troublesome. Wouldn't recommend if you are sensitive. Or buy just one before you commit to more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I love these. They're so refreshing. If you've had a long day or have been crying (really) they're soothing and depuffing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only under eye patches I use. I always use them when Iu2019ve had a bad nightu2019s sleep and want to feel and look more awake in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like these because unlike most eye masks they actually stay where you put them and do not slide down your face. They are a bit cooling, but nothing crazy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this product at all. It was hard to take off, sticking to my skin. The next morning the skin under my eyes were swollen and red. I returned the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As I am over 60, I tend to get puffiness after snacking on too many potato chips or salty food in general. Generally, I try to eat healthy most times and drink lots of water, but sometimes it is almost impossible to get rid of those puffs. It tends to happen at the most in-opportune time , like a special occasion or photo ops or i just want to get out and go shopping! I tried these eye gels, and at first I thought they were dried out because they werenu2019t sopping with gel, but whatever is in those patches made an impression on me...it reduced the puffiness noticeably. Itu2019s a quick (but temporary) fix and the price is decent when you consider how many you get in the package. I keep mine in the fridge for extra benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These feel lovely on (especially if you store them in the fridge) but for me, have absolutely no effect on under eye puffiness, dark circles or fine lines

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first experience with using eye masks and I could not have been more impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these patches! Super cooling and I definitely noticed a difference undesirably after. Not sure that they made much of a long-term difference but I certainly think theyu2019re worth the value if youu2019re trying to firm up your under eye area or soothe your skin. I have very sensitive eyes and skin and love the way these feel, and I love that I donu2019t react to them.   However, Iu2019ve taken off a star because these patches are SUPER over packaged. What a waste of plastic! Iu2019ve used other SKYN products because they have glass containers and I find the products non irritating, but I will not repurchase these unless they reduce their packaging significantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used 5 times now , only positive thing I liked was how cool they felt mind you I did keep them in the fridge. However, they didn't do anything for me in terms of puffiness, might as  well just use tea bags .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love these! Instant relief for tired eyes. De-puffs and brightens. Reduces the appearance of bags as well! Love these for a quick fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of these and used them when my eyes were extremely puffy. They have a pleasant cooling sensation that isn't too strong. I like that they are scent-free and cover a large area under the eyes. They definitely worked for me in terms of de-puffing since my under eyes improved and my eyelids remained puffy in comparison. I didn't notice if they improved dark circles or fine lines since it wasn't my primary concern. I'd probably get these again for emergency de-puffing or when I feel like having a treat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got one as a trial, it didnu2019t do anything for my under eyes and it started burning after a couple minutes. Wouldnu2019t buy in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are magic. More than any other eye treatment or mask, these reduce puffiness and under eye circles. They're best used right before an event or start of the day, while getting ready. More than once they've saved my face during a work conference before my presentation or after a night out. I wish I could what is in these masks in a serum for day to day use. They're a little large, but they stay in place and are easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Rien vu de remarquable avec ces patchs je ne recommanderais pas!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately these didn't work for me.  Made my under eyes crepey and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cool concept, allows that fresh and cool feeling with any harsh chemicals and can be used on sensitive skin, but moving forward, we ought to be mindful of the products we use, and this wastes so so so much plastic and uses so much packaging which makes me feel so badly about the impact just me using it has. If the packaging could be different perhaps I would repurchase. But the impact on the environment is a bit much for me :/

reviews.review_text: Dried out my eyes, tried it again and did the same,had to return to store.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving these two stars because they stick firmly to your face and are comfortable to wear. They are not cooling, do not reduce under eye bags or puffiness, and do not hydrate. I will stick to the more expensive eye masks next time.

reviews.review_text: These eye gel patches are the perfect cooling shot of moisture after a long day. I just wish they came in less packaging.

Tru00e8s bizarre. Je trouvais aussi quu2019il y avait un surplus du2019emballage et de plastique... je ne recommande pas!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I was pretty pleased with this product as I thought it made my under eyes look brighter but then after the 2nd or 3rd time using this product I noticed that it caused a sort of chicken skin effect under my eye and it happened right after i took off the patches! not very pleased and would not recommend or maybe only use once in a while in case of severe darkness or puffiness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of different under eye masks if a lot of different textures. By far this one let me continue on with my life while providing a nice cooling effect.  definitely buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product Iu2019m a 21 yr old female with dry under eyes and this seems to have reduced the fine lines i had and also hydrate and reduce puffiness. I use these once a week and thats enough for me to see a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: single-use packaging (ideal for travel), patches stay put and don't slip around, no irritation caused.  Cons: I didn't notice a difference.   I'm only 22 but I do have noticeable fine-lines underneath my eyes. I didn't notice a reduction in those lines, nor any depuffing. My under-eyes looked the same, not worse, not better. Not any softer or smoother, either.  I tried these patches two times, under different circumstances. First on freshly cleansed and exfoliated skin AND second on unwashed, dehydrated, and flaky skin.  No difference both times.  The experience of eye gels seems exciting at first but you'd be better off slicing some cucumber and putting that over your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought these because I read that they were biodegradable. Thatu2019s only the patches. They come in a plastic tray and plastic pouch. Such a waste! Product worked well but I wonu2019t be repurchasing. Too wasteful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product twice after a long sleepless night and it does help dramatically with the puffiness, not so much the fine lines or wrinkles. It's a great quick fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Refreshing and stays on your face firmly without slipping, everything the packaging describes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried many different under eye u201cpatchesu201d and these are my favourite. Love the shape, very comfortable to put on and wear.  I have very puffy under eyes and it really helped a lot. Left my undereye less puffy and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried these in the face lift in a bag and fell in love! All the cooking gels from them are amazing! It really makes you look more awake and fresh and also just feels amazing on the face. Not sure if there's any long term benefits but if you need a quick fix they're great

reviews.review_title: Gets rid of bags in 10 mins!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are a must-have for people who don't get enough sleep. One of these babies and a coffee will resurrect you from your hangover.

reviews.review_title: Feels great but did nothing for my hollows
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try these eye mask's after seeing all the rage.  I am a 33 yo Caucasian women who has been cursed with hollows under my eyes.  They are definitely becoming more pronounced with age.  Hopeful to fin a solution that doesn't involve fillers I've been trying a slew of products to help.  These eye gels feel amazing on, a slight cooling sensation that feels great on tired eyes but unfortunately didn't help in the least with my hollows and fine lines.  I think these are better suited for puffiness and darkness.  It was worth a try but honestly think fillers will be the only thing to help.  :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like other reviewers said - they feel really nice and cooling and donu2019t irritate my sensitive eyes. But once I take them off, I donu2019t notice much of a difference in how my undereye looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! I feel so ritzy when I use them. No long term results but they do have a nice cooling sensation and my under eyes do feel firmer for a while. i prefer to use them in the morning because the results don't last overnight for me. I don't wear under eye concealer so can't say how they work under makeup but they are inexpensive and a nice way to pamper yourself once or twice a week. will definitely repurchase .  Also don't irritate under my eyes like the sephora masks do. and they aren't soaked with serum to the point where all they do is slide around. they stay in place when you apply them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tru00e8s bon produit, mes poches et mes cernes ont pratiquement disparu. Je vais en racheter c'est certain!

reviews.review_title: you get what you pay for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving this product 2 stars because of the fair price and that they do cool the eyes. But I did not feel or see any results with fixing puffiness, dryness and firmness. I work long hours and also when I go out I tend to stay up late... I also live in Canada where we get cold and dry winters that seem to last forever. These eye gel masks look cool but really do nothing. I like there is no fragrance to these but I find if I get them too close to my eye that they almost pinch the skin between my eye and the mask. Ouch. I had the tarte ones before that are super gel and smooth and never had that issue. I will keep using until they are done but not a huge fan and will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Meh, I didn't see a mega transformation after using this once. Maybe you have to use it more frequently to get results, or be more stressed out than I was at the time. It's also a bit expensive for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does not make a difference on me. Don't recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to pick me up, for when I feel or know my eyes will be extra fatigued or puffy (sleeping late, weddings, parties etc.). I throw them on in the morning when I wake up, and it honestly just calms the area under my eye.  I also notice that every time I use it, any bumps under my eyes just disappear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A product that actually does what it says and works instantly!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting it to be more hydrating it isnt at all but it feels somewhat fiming. It is cooling though so it feels nice but no hydration in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cooling, depuffing, hydrating, I repurchased this twice because #treatyoself. I love these theyu2019re amazing little pick me ups for when my eye bags are having an especially gruesome time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Work pretty well and are awesome for travel, threw one in my carry on and tossed them on awhile before we landed to arrive with fresh eyes. def was refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing - gets rid of puffy eyes in the am very quickly - not slippery like other eye patches. Keep in fridge for cooling effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These deliciously cooling eye masks are like 8 hours of sleep in a 15 minute treatment - stop reading this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these. I have two babies, which means I donu2019t get a lot of sleep. These gems reduce puffiness and dark circles. Best of all, they arenu2019t messy at all -just peel the backs off, and stick them on. No rinsing after. This is a huge incentive to use them, unlike masks, which I dread using because of the rinsing and cleanup involved after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: These are easy to apply/remove and do stay in place for the whole 10 minutes. The patches do have a pleasant cooling effect. Iu2019m not sure I can see a difference but I could see myself using these when my eyes are really tired. The cooling effect is very soothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had my doubts about these,but they really do help with puffyiness and dark circles, and 4 pairs for $18 is a good deal I'd say

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, no irritation even though the product is very concentrated like all Skyn Iceland products.  Very easy to use. Stick on the face well! Right after taking them out I was amazed! No wrinkles! But after some minutes everything became like it used to be before.  But I hope that if I use them for longer period it will really help =) So, I have already ordered full size product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They're okay. It's a nice cooling sensation but I didn't notice any real difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm an eye mask fanatic. These are great and feel very soothing on the eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first eye patch purchase. These patches were fine, and decent for the price. I just don't know if they actually did anything that lasted beyond the day. I do like that each are individually packaged (reducing chances of putting bacteria near your eyes), and they were comfortable enough to wear for a short while. I did not experience any irritation, and they were hydrating. I did apply them before an evening out, and did my eyeshadow while they were on to capture any fall-out - that was pretty handy.

reviews.review_title: Decreases under eye puffiness, not dark circles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin in that parts of my skin are dry (around my nose), and parts of my skin are oily (cheekbones, forehead, chin). I also have really terrible puffy purple circles under my eyes, so I bought these when they were on sale to try them out. The package recommends using them only once a week. I use them Friday nights after the work week is done. I leave them on for 10 minutes like the instructions say and I do feel like my under eye area is cooler and tighter after I remove these pads. My undereye area is definitely not as puffy. However, I havenu2019t noticed a huge decrease in dark circles. This is packaged as a large bag containing 8 individually packaged under eye gels. One of the individual packets I received came dried out (there was a hole in the packet I think) so check that because the pads wonu2019t stick when you use them (Sephora customer service was wonderful when I called in about this). Overall I like the product but would I spent another $33 for 8 packets? Not sure. I might try other brands first to see how they compare to this. Skyn is cruelty free though, so thatu2019s an added bonus to this company.

reviews.review_title: Does the job for a great price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these. Great price and I definitely notice a difference in my puffy eyes after using them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No other eye gel quite like this one! I noticed instant results from dark circles and puffiness and so did my boyfriend who would not stop complimenting me. Doesnu2019t take any time at all so they are great for a quick fix up before rushing out of the house. They have a very refreshing cooling feeling as soon and you apply them to your skin which is awesome. Did browse other eye masks after becoming and eye mask junky and must say that this one is by far the best and I would recommend it to anyone.
My number 1 eye mask in life. I like to wear it after one layer of eye serum or eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best for eye if you need to get rid of puffiness and dark circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Agreed with bottom reviewer- Not usually one to buy. buy got them in a set I got from Skyn on boxing day. These are amazing! I put mine in the fridge for a bit before using them. Omg yes felt SO GOOD  Yes I recommend these 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Typically I donu2019t buy into things these. I found they never actually work. However these cams highly recommended from a magazine I was reading. So far I only used one and it was amazing!! The cooling sensation was really apparent and soothing. I should have used it first thing in the morning but I tried it at night. So my eyes were refreshed and awake... and then I went to bed. Not sure if the forming part actually works, but I really gave 5 stars because it cooled, soothed and refreshed my eye area. Which is so badly needed in -40 weather we are having tight now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the Skyn product line, but the eye gels are by far my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t do anything at all, no depuffing, did not got rid of my dark circles. I give it 2 stars only because itu2019s not sticky like other eye masks

reviews.review_text: Refreshing filling only  not worth the money  I don't recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite patches! This brand is not very known, but has an amazing, high quality products. If you have puffy eyes in the morning, those will save your life ;) while doing your morning routine they will work with your skin, love, love it. u2764u2764u2764

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The firming gels work so well to help reduce the lines under the eyes. Amazing product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to purchase. It effectively gets rid of the bags under my eyes. I've tried several other products and this one works the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I'm writing a review for a product. This one is really amazing and you can see the instant result just for one use!!!! And I can also use it for the smile lines after 15 minutes mask on the eyes:) that's worth more lol. Will keep on using it for sure!

reviews.review_title: my favourite Treat Yo Self item
reviews.review_text: I have bought these 3 times because I love them so much. There aren't as many as from, say PTR, but these always leave my undereyes brighter, more awake and smooth. You don't have to wipe away any residue, and you can even pop them on and do your eye makeup while getting ready for an event, remove and do your base. I keep mine in the fridge to boost that cooling effect. Absolutely adore these, will continue to purchase.

These little things are small wonders! I bought them for the first time about a year ago and am now purchasing on the regular. Use once a week or whenever you need a pick me up. I have dark bags under my eyes from lack of sleep and genetics, as well as under eye puffiness, and these patches make such a difference! I recommend keeping them in the fridge as the cooling effect feels fantastic and boosts the results. They don't clog my pores like some under eye solutions, and I notice results immediately which is satisfying. Definitely recommend!

u know the gel patches u put on the back of ur heels to prevent it from falling off? This is exactly what this feels like. If you want to stick two silicon patches on ur eye and have no hydration, this is the product for you.

These gels are a little on the pricey side; however, I love to use these once in a while on a relax/treat myself kind of day. These gels are slightly adhesive so they stick on your face and you are able to wander about or sit in front of the tv while they do their magic. They have a great cooling feeling when on your skin and after 10 minutes is up, the area under my eyes feels super soft and tight/firm. These gels are great for firming and getting rid of puffiness/dark circles you may have under your eyes. They are definitely worth a try, but are a bit pricey for regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! They definitely de-puff and they feel wonderful. After a long summer's day I like to lay down in the dark with these on, good times.   No sensitivity issues.
I love these! They feel great on- soothing and calming. I leave them on for 20 min and I can really notice a difference- I always use before an important evening!

reviews.review_title: Great for the bad under-eye days
reviews.review_text: These are perfect for reducing the particularly bad under-eye bags caused by lack of sleep or a busy draining week. I wouldn't use day to day, but when you need a quick fix. They're calming, super hydrating and feel great on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a little bit of an eye-gel junkie- I work in an office and starring at a computer screen all day really makes my eyes feel tired and dry. I love putting these on in the evening and taking a bubble bath for a little relaxation and pampering though they're most effective if you do them in the morning before your makeup routine. I notice instant hydration and brightness though remember these are good for a 'quick fix' and not a treatment- so if you have dark circles or puffiness you should still be using an eye cream! I keep these in the fridge for the extra cooling effect. Not too bad of a price, but I am giving them 4 stars instead of 5 because though I like them, I also like the Lise Watier ones- they have about the same results in my opinion so these ones don't stand out as the absolute best but they are really good!
Very expensive for what it is, did not see an improvement in my dark circles or puffiness around my eyes. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is no serum or beneficial ingredients in the mask. It is cooling and soothing. But I can't see any visible difference to the look of my eyes. For its price, I would give it a pass. Put a spoon in the fridge and it does the same thing.
I love these I continue to order them.. so refreshing when your up at 5am and have a long day ahead. It has become an important step in my morning routine

These eye masks feel so fresh and cool on the skin. Visible decrease in under eye darkness and puffiness. I've used this product twice now and have been very happy with results. I have sensitive skin with rosecea and this mask did not cause and additional redness or irritation.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love these more....
reviews.review_text: I did like these eye masks but I will probably not repurchase. I think my expectations were too high because of the rave reviews. I don't have bad dark circles under my eyes and I purchased these for puffiness. These did  de-puff my eyes and had a wonderful cooling effect, however I can get similar results by placing frozen caffeinated tea bags under my eyes. These are quite pricey and maybe if I had bad dark circles they would be worth splurging on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The space between my eyebrows and my cheekbones is not my friend u2013 I have dry eyes, the area underneath my eyes is dry, when I don't get more than 7 hours of sleep my eyes become puffy and I need to double up on concealer, when I cry at all they become incredibly swollen, and allergies cause them to be constantly watery and itchy, which makes me rub them (I know, I try not to, but it's hard!) and that makes my under-eye area look dull and to be honest, quite sore. I tried these on a whim because they looked soothing. Iu2019ve used eye masks before (you know the ones that look like sleeping masks that you keep in the fridge?) but all those did was make my eyes feel better for a short time. I now use these Eye Gels at least once a week, usually on a Wednesday or Thursday as a mid-week refresher, and I find they not only make my under-eye area look smooth and refreshed, but more importantly they make my under-eye area feel smooth and refreshed. I honestly look forward to waking up early on Wednesday and putting these on before I get ready for work. I highly recommend these to anyone looking for a weekly pick me up in the eye area.
I love these eye gels. I first tried them in an ipsy bag and have since repurchased several times, both for myself and for others. They're really calming and refreshing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are the little secret I use before putting on makeup for an evening function. Quick and easy eyelift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The eye gels did feel cool on my skin and I did feel hydrated after using it. Would repurchase, but I usually like to try different brands out. Do recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am hoocked and just ordered the packed of 8 i have just one worf to describe it: wow!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a serious illness and a stay in the ICU last year, I couldn't shake the severe dark circles and puffy eyes I'd developed during that time. I tried a lot of different eye treatments and eye gels. I received a sample of these and wasn't especially hopeful, but I was blown away. I noticed an immediate difference in how my under eye area looked and was thrilled by the results at a time when my skin in general needed all the help it could get! I immediately ordered the 8 pack of eye gels. From a practical standpoint, the eye gels are the most comfortable to wear that I've tried, fit well, and stay put. I tend to save them for special occasions, or when my under eye area needs more of a boost than my daily eye treatments can give. I also leave them on for longer than the 10 minutes recommended. Very soothing to use with actual results to boot! Highly recommend!
Amazing, feels so good and really workswell for fine lines

Got these as a gift and now I want to buy the whole line! These pads work almost instantly and I notified a difference straight away. Eyes were silky smooth and looked amazing after using. I'm going to recomend these to everyone I know!

reviews.review_title: Does what it says- would buy again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These patches are thick and saturated with product which leads to a really nice cooling effect. Their shape is also great as they narrow at one end to fit into the space between the nose and the eye. I used them according to their instructions and I noticed immediate improvements in brightness, hydration, and dark circles. I like that the product doesn't require you to wash your skin following use, so you could even do your eye makeup while you have these on! I don't think these patches are designed to have long-term effects, but they are definitely a good temporary solution to prep for an event or to follow a long flight or late night. Would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These Firming Eye Gels are incredible and are a great price! After reading the other reviews I also thought I had a bad batch because I touched it and it was dry.  The key is removing the plastic backing and that is where all the gel goodness is locked in.  My eyes have never looked so refreshed.  HG eye treatment for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are great! Perfect for when you are going out to a party or an event and want your undereyes to look bomb! They looks tight and smooth and my concealer goes on like a dream after I put these on, no creasing at all! Feels super hydrating and refreshing! Love it!

I bought these for when i want to relax. They don't necessarily brighten the under-eye, but they do feel realy goos and cold and i have noticed a de-puffing effect. If you're looking for something to brighten then i wouldn't recommend, but they're great for relaxing and when you just want to do some skincare. And they're not that expesive.

I tried these a few days ago, when i opened the package they felt like there was no product on them,   and after having them on for 10 to 20 minutes I didn't notice a difference at all. They remind me of cheap eye masks you get at Sally's beauty supply

Bad! So disappointing-peeled off a pair and thought, oh this packet must have had an air leak and dried out.  Opened another packet and the same thing,  Tried to keep them on for 10 minutes, but too dry and uncomfortable.  About as hydrating as sand.
These are so great, I wish they were cheaper, so I don't feel like I have to hold off on using them. They feel so great, and really leave me refreshed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had recived this as a sample with a purchase, and used this along with a sample of the REN daily shot.   And this was absolutely amazing! I tried this specifically in the morning after pulling an all nighter for work and this worked within minutes after removing the patches and i only had them on for 5minutes! Loved it so much i made a purchase of the actual full size product!
Minimal results for my skin! I've used four times. Like the sephora eye masks the best so far. Xx

So if you have any fine lines or puffiness you NEED these eye gels!! I was blown away by the visible results I saw immediately after taking these off! They are now my holy grail eye treatment, I'll use them once a week when I do my little Sunday evening pampering, or if I'm going out on a Friday or Saturday night before my make up. Any fine lines or puffiness is instantly gone! As for dark circles under the eyes I didn't see a huge difference but I'm very fair without my tan in a can and tend to be purple around the eyes always. Highly highly recommend these!!
Instantly removes any puffiness under eyes, got this free with mobile sample, will continue to buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample with a Sephora promo code and I'm so glad I tried them! I put the eye mask in the fridge to cool before I put them on, then left the masks on for 30 mins. When I peeled off the eye masks, my eye wrinkles were completely gone!!! It was an immediate and visible difference - I will be purchasing the full size of this product.

reviews.review_title: Great Alternative to the High End Patches!
reviews.review_text: I love eye patches, but they can be a costly indulgence. My favourites were the CHANEL and Guerlain ones, but both were around 165.00 for a set of about 8. The difference with the more expensive brands was the inclusion of a beautiful eye serum, which you would apply in advance. These ones do a lovely job without an eye serum at a fraction of the price, and when you add your own eye serum or cream, the effect is quite remarkable. If you like to use eye patches weekly like me, these are a great affordable alternative, and save the high end ones for special events!

This was my first time using eye gels, I had high hopes for this since I heard rave reviews about it. I was not impressed, it does feel nice and soothing but I did not notice any real transformation in the eye area. Perhaps you need to use it more consistently to notice a difference. A big pro was that it was non irritating to my very sensitive eye area but I'd personally go with a cold compress over the eye area next time.

I received these as a sample back when I had a birchbox. LOVE THEM. So very excited to see Sephora carries this brand now in Canada - no import duties or shipping costs. I will never be without this product ever again. 100% a game changer for my very dry, very dark eye area. Brightens, depuffs, and moisturizes! Good price for how many you get in a package.

I just love this eye mask. Safe for most sensitive skins (lacks the irritation-causing spearmint-like minty-ness that a lot of masks have while still being cooling and doesn't seem to have any fragrance). Refreshing and not messy at all!

I love these! I keep the package in the fridge all the time so they give that extra cooling and de-puffing sensation when I need them. I am only 20 so don't use them to help fix fine lines or firm, I use them when I have a late night and an early class the next morning. So refreshing and they help combat redness. I also love that they aren't saturated with serum but rather have a sticky gel coat so they really stay put under my eyes while I can move around and get ready. Awesome product!

I had heard great things about these and was SO excited to try them. Unfortunately, they didn't make a lick of difference. Snapled pix before using then immediately after, as they are more of a quick fix than a treatment, but there was virtually no difference in my bags. Best I can say is they soften the skin and feel nice.
These eye patches are easy to use, super cool and very effective. Even on sensitive skin. I find myself wanting to use them every chance I get. Great weekly pick me up in your skincare regime.
